directions: Toss beef with salt, pepper and flour to coat.  Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.  Cook coated beef in oil, stirring constantly, until well browned on all sides.  Pour in broth and tomato juice, and stir in mixed vegetables, potatoes and cabbage.  Bring to a boil, then reduce heat, cover and simmer 1 hour, until potatoes are soft and meat is fully cooked.
title: Best Ever Beef Stew
